body:
@ptrblck That's fine. It seems that we are all clear on this issue. Now I want to make a PR for it. Specifically, I want to add some helpful tips to the `batchnorm` and `instancenorm` entries in the documentation. The reason why I decided to modify the doc instead of assuming running average std in the `n=1` case can be found [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/7716#issuecomment-390572717). Can you help me with this? I need someone to review the code after I open a new PR.

However, if we use `nn.DataParallel`, this issue may still happen even when `batchsize > 1` (other dimension except channel shoud == 1). I have no idea yet on how to fix this.
